name: The hunt for treasure
description:
Final version

I've uploaded an updated version of my Game Jam submission.  This fixes a couple of issues I wanted to fix:

1) Added a countdown timer which shows how long the gate to the treasure is open for.

2) Fixed a bug where the mouse doesn't show up at the end of the game.

3) Made the speedup gates rotate 180 degrees instead of 90.  This will make it easier to figure out what orientation they should all be in so you can zoom to the treasure.

4) Added some additional particle effects, because it was fun!

GDU GameJam version

This is a submission to the 4th '72hr' GDU Game Jam.  The theme is 'Underwater'.

In this game, you control a submarine and must collect coloured spheres to enable 'fast-travel' gates.

Get the gates in the right alignment and you might just get to the treasure before the gates close! 

There are likely to be bugs and other issues in this game. I've used HDRP and it's not very well optimised, you might need a mid-range PC to play this.
